00067 #ifndef _NT_CODES_H_
00068 #define _NT_CODES_H_
00069 
00070 #include "nt_main.h"
00071 //#include "nt_types.h"
00072 
00074 enum NTclassCode { 
00076 NT_O = 1,
00078 NT3D_O = 1000000
00079     };
00080 
00082 enum NTimageFileType {NT_AUTO, NT_RAW, NT_NT=1, NT_PPM, NT_BMP, NT_TGA, NT_GIF, NT_JPG, NT_PNG, NT_UNKNOWN};
00083 enum NTimageDataFormat {NT_SINGLE_CHANNEL = 1, NT_RGB = 3, NT_RGBA = 4,
00084                         NT_RED, NT_GREEN, NT_BLUE, NT_ALPHA}; 
00085                         /* SINGLE-channel corresponds to a single "gray" channel */
00086 
00088 enum NTcountryCode{ NT_EU           =-1, 
00089                 NT_USA          =1,
00090                 NT_ITALY        =39,
00091                 NT_UK           =44,
00092                 NT_GERMANY      =49
00093             } ;
00094 /*
00095 #define NT_EU  (-1)
00096 #define NT_USA (1) // ?
00097 #define NT_ITALY (39)
00098 #define NT_UK    (44)
00099 #define NT_GERMANY (49)
00100 */
00101 
00102 /* *** CURRENCY NAMES *** */
00103 #define NT_EURO_CURRENCY "Euro"
00104 #define NT_USA_CURRENCY  "US-Dollar"
00105 #define NT_ITALY_CURRENCY "Lira Italiane"
00106 #define NT_GERMANY_CURRENCY "Deutsche Mark"
00107 
00108 
00109 enum NTstockExchangeId{  NT_STKEXC_UNDEF        =0,
00110                 /* USA */
00111                 NT_STKEXC_NYSE      =1000,
00112                 NT_STKEXC_NASDAQ    =2000,
00113                 /* EUROPE */
00114                 NT_STKEXC_FTSE      =10000,
00115                 NT_STKEXC_FSE       =20000
00116             } ;
